mapper.select: select p.`product_id` as product_id, p.`product_title` as product_name, ci.`cartItem_quantity` as count, p.`product_price` as price from shoppingcart sc, cartitem ci, product p where sc.`shoppingCart_user_id` = #{uid} and sc.`shoppingCart_id` = ci.cart_id and ci.`cartItem_product_id` = p.`product_id`
